mapper.update: update apply_template set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, introduce, creator_id, is_valid, create_time from apply_template
